de.geofencing.client.beaconScanner

Class BeaconScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.client.beaconScanner.BeaconScanner

  • public class BeaconScanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Scans for beacons in range of the Device and provides every necessary functions to scan. If the beacons in range change the BeaconChangeListener is called. If an error occurs the LogHandler is called. Uses Jaalee API (Needs jaalee-beacon-android-sdk-master.jar)
    Author:
    Markus Thral

      • isScanRunning

        public boolean isScanRunning()
        Returns status of the scanner
        Returns:
        true if scan is running, false if not

      • setScanPeriods

        public void setScanPeriods(int scanPeriod,
                           int scanWaitTime)
        Sets scanPeriod and wait-time between to scans, but always the minimum values.
        Parameters:
        scanPeriod - Scan-time in milliseconds
        scanWaitTime - Time between to scans in milliseconds

      • setBeaconChangeListener

        Deactivates bluetooth
        Returns:
        true if bluetooth is deactivated, false if not

      • startScan

        public boolean startScan()
        Starts scanning for beacons, asks for activating bluetooth and starts service
        Returns:
        true if starting succeeded, false if not

      • stopScan

        public boolean stopScan()
        Stops scanning for beacons and deactivates service
        Returns:
        true if stopping succeeded, false if not
